com.gilran.chess.board

Class CastlingRights

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gilran.chess.board.CastlingRights

  •  class CastlingRights
extends java.lang.Object
    The castling rights a chess position.
    Author:
    Gil Ran

    • Field Detail

      • rightsMap

        private java.util.Map<CastlingRights.Castle,java.lang.Boolean> rightsMap
        The castling rights of each side. For each side, the inner map will have KING_SIDE and QUEEN_SIDE as keys, and a boolean indicating if the side is holding the right to castle in that direction.
